name: Grimoire: Ars Bellica
description:
This game is in very early development!

Grimoire: Ars Bellica is a turn-based, strategy RPG where you are a prodigy wizard facing monsters that threaten civilization. Learn spells and carefully choose which to bring into battle. Find the best combinations and show your dominance over the arcane arts!

How to play

Play with the mouse! Right-click cancels spells!

Spells are currently unchangeable and very cryptic. Here's a brief explanation:

Magic Missile. A single-target ranged spell that deals 1 damage. Monsters have 3 hit points.

Create Rock. Summons a rock in the target tile. Rocks are indestructible.

Create Booster. Summons a magical booster that instantly moves you 3 tiles in the desired direction. When you cast this spell, you have to select a target position AND direction, relative to the previously selected position.

Deflective Ward. Makes all abilities target at you be deflected to the nearest target available. Not very useful because you are the only creature capable of targeting others... or is it?

Create Resonant Energizer. Summons a crystal that powers your spells up as long as you are near it. It adds +1 damage to your spells for each status you currently have (hint: the only status in the game right now is deflective ward).

Have fun.
